dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.headline: Hey, are you all right?
dashboard.text: Select an existing document or create a new one...

add.title: Click here to create a new document

documentReconcile.title: Reconcile accounts
documentReconcile.headline: Reconcile accounts
documentReconcile.noAccounts: You do not have a manual account that needs to be reconciled.

text.negative: Oh, you probably forgot to put something in there. To compensate for this, a new transaction for %(amount)s is created. You can define budget and description below.
text.positive: Congratulations, you actually have more money in your account than you registered. A new transaction is created for %(amount)s to add this. You can define budget and description below.

label.saveAndNext: Okay, on to the next account...

button.title: One click and the document is deleted.

destroy.message: With the red button you can delete this document. Please click only if you are really sure. All bank accounts, transactions and budgets are irretrievably deleted!
destroy.confirm: Are you really sure you want to delete this document? You can't restore it unless you've made a backup...

message.plugin: You cannot delete this account because it is managed by a plugin. First remove the plugin from the document.
message.empty: You can safely delete this account as there are no transactions on this account. Your budget will not change.
message.dangerous: Deleting the account deletes all transactions in it. Your budget will probably no longer work out.

destroy.title: Delete account and all transactions on it
destroy.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this account and all transactions in it? Your budget won't work out afterwards!

uninstall.headline: Remove plugin
uninstall.message: If you no longer want to use this plugin, you can remove it from the document. All synchronized data is retained and can then be edited or removed manually.
uninstall.confirm: Are you really sure you want to remove this plugin? All synchronized data is retained and can be edited manually.

index.title: Add Account
index.headline: Add Account
index.text: What kind of account do you want to add to your document?

searchBank.title: Search bank
searchBank.headline: Search for Bank Plugin
searchBank.text: You can search for plugins that automatically query your account and sync transactions. So your budget is always up to date. To check if there is a plugin for your bank or your online account, please enter the bank's BIC below. If you do not have a BIC at hand, the name of the bank will also work alternatively.

empty.msg: Unfortunately no plugin was found for your bank. However, you can create the account manually.

notThat.msg: You can still create the account manually.

addPlugin.title: Search Plugin
addPlugin.headline: Search Plugin
addPlugin.text: You can search for plugins that automatically retrieve your account, retrieve transaction information or create savings targets for you. To check if there is a plugin for your bank or online shop, please enter the name of the shop or bank below.

q.label: Name of the online shop or bank

empty.msg: Sorry, no plugin was found for your term.

hasBudgets.one: Cannot be deleted, because there is still a budget in this category...
hasBudgets.other: Cannot be deleted, because there are still %(count)s budgets in this category...

editBudget.headline: Edit Budget
editBudget.pluginNotice: This budget is managed by a plugin. You cannot edit the target while the plugin is installed.

add.title: Click to enter a transaction manually...

import.onlyOne: Please only drag one file into this at a time, otherwise I get completely confused...
import.label: Import %(file)s on this account:

info.scan: Scan the following QR code in your DWIMM app to log in with this account. You will then have access to all your documents and settings in the app.
info.accept: Client "%(name)s" wants access to your DWIMM account. This gives the application the necessary rights to view and edit all documents in your account. The client can pass this permission without notifying you. Do you trust this client and allow access?
